title: Philosophical fellowship 2
description:
I am joined again by Tracy, Robert, and Kira to do  another round of philosophical fellowship. This time I also recorded the philosophical background and the view of the practices. We pick a passage form the work of Meister Eckhart. 

Once again I want to thank Ran Lahav for inspiring philosophical fellowship with his work on philosophical contemplative companionship.
